name: tabflow-monorepo
description: TabFlow - A local-first, reliability-focused tab manager

scripts.build:all: npm run extension:build && npm run api:build
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix apps/extension && npm run format --prefix apps/api
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix apps/extension && npm run format:check --prefix apps/api
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix apps/extension && npm install --prefix apps/api
